data.actual_result: Message pop-up gets cut off to where you scrolled up.
data.expected_result: The message pop-up scrolls down properly.
data.short_description: When you scroll up from message pop-up and scroll down, the top section gets cut off. (Small screen size + low-end devices specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - First, send a message to a server you have administrator permission in. - Then, react to your own message (this is to help increase the amount of options in the pop-up). - Next, long-hold the message to get the message pop-up. - Scroll up all the way to the point you need to scroll to get back down (this is why it's small screen size + low-end devices specific. Newer versions and bigger screen doesn't allow you to scroll on message pop-up). - Scroll back down and observe.
